name: 陳金聖
objective: 本課程在使學生認識嵌入式即時多工核心，瞭解其架構，並學習嵌入式即時多工核心之設計與相關應用技術。內容包含：(1)嵌入式系統介紹，(2)即時多工系統觀念介紹，(3)即時多工核心運作方式，(4)工作管理，(5)時間管理，(6)記憶體管理，(7)事件管理，(8)於嵌入式系統建制即時多工核心。
schedule:
Week 01 (09/19): Introduction.
Week 02 (09/26): Decelopment tools and real-time systems concepts.
Week 03 (10/03): Real-time systems concepts.
Week 04 (10/10): National birthday.
Week 05 (10/15): Kernel structure.
Week 06 (10/22): Kernel structure.
Week 07 (10/29): Task management.
Week 08 (11/05): Time management and event control block (ECB).
Week 09 (11/12): Semaphore management.
Week 10 (11/19): Mutual exclusion semaphore management.
Week 11 (11/26): Midterm.
Week 12 (12/03): Message Mailbox Management.
Week 13 (12/10): Message Queue Management.
Week 14 (12/17): Event Flag Management.
Week 15 (12/24): UART (RS232).
Week 16 (12/31): 80x86 porting and final project discussion.
Week 17 (01/07): DSP porting and final project discussion.
Week 18 (01/14): Final project presentation.
scorePolicy:
50 percent: Assignments.
20 percent: The midterm exam.
30 percent: The final project.
materials:
Textbook：
1.Jean J. Labrosse, “MicroC/ OS II: The Real-Time Kernel 2nd Edition”, CMPBooks, 2002.
Reference book：
1.Qing Li with Caroline Yao, ”Real-Time Concepts for Embedded Systems”, CMPBooks, 2003.
2.Phillip A. Laplante, “Real-Time Systems Design and Analysis”, A John Wiley & Sons , INC., Publication, 2004.
3.Jean J. Labrosse, “Embedded Systems Building Blocks”, CMPBooks, 2002.
4.Wayne Wolf, “Computers as Components, Principles of Embedded Computing System Design”, Morgan Kaufmann Publishers, 2001.
5.Stuart Benneff, “Real-Time Computer Control”, 2nd Ed., Prentice Hall , New York, 1994.
6.胡竹生，尹燕陶，“即時多工核心程式設計”，全華圖書。
